description: From Middle English synneles, senneles, from Old English synlēas (“without sin; sinless”), equivalent to sin +‎ -less. Compare Dutch zondeloos (“sinless”), German Low German sündelos, sündlos (“sinless”), German sündenlos (“sinless”), Icelandic syndlaus (“sinless”).

adjectives.description: sinless (comparative more sinless, superlative most sinless)
